Break out of your bubble

Partisan.IO is a web and mobile platform for connecting you to new people based on your politics.

Partisan is for: everyone!

Get Started!

Based on beliefs,
not labels

You don't need to be an expert in politics to use Partisan! Here's how it works:

Answer a short questionaire

Twenty yes/no questions is all it takes to determine your beliefs.

We calculate the results

Using our custom algorithm we deduce your politics.

Find your matches!

We then find people with similar politics to yours and match you up!

Use it how you want

Find Friends

No one in your life to talk politics with? Find like-minded people in your area!

Find Love

Find that special someone that shares your views!

Find Enemies

Love to debate? Find your enemies and tell them why theyâ€™re wrong!
